biotools.summary: Able to analyze all the traits jointly. The framework is flexible in that it can handle both continuous and binary traits, or a mixture of them. In addition, it can accommodate family data, can adjust for covariates (such as ancestry variables, age, gender, etc.), and can be combined efficiently across studies with different designs.

bioschemas.name: MOST
bioschemas.summary: Able to analyze all the traits jointly. The framework is flexible in that it can handle both continuous and binary traits, or a mixture of them. In addition, it can accommodate family data, can adjust for covariates (such as ancestry variables, age, gender, etc.), and can be combined efficiently across studies with different designs.
